General.Name: Bringspring Science and Tech
General.Description: Bringspring Science and Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on health data and cloud services in China. The company operates through Health Data Services and Intelligent Integrated Cloud Services segments. The Health Data Services segment provides clinical information segmentation products and health big data platforms. This segment also offers standard and efficient medical information software products; and system integration, operation, and maintenance services. The Intelligent Integrated Cloud Services segment provides intelligent integration cloud platform and big data cloud center services. This segment provides a range of intelligent integrated cloud solutions and services, including system integration, operation and maintenance, software and hardware sales, and software development services. Bringspring Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenyang, China.
